The purity, the holiness of the life of Jesus as presented from the Word of God, possess more power to reform and transform the character than do all 


                                    -121- 

the efforts put forth in picturing the sins and crimes of men and the sure results. One steadfast look to the Saviour uplifted upon the cross will do more to purify the mind and heart from every defilement than will all the scientific explanations by the ablest tongue.
